title.withExpiryDate: How much and when to pay?

instalments.default: You can pay in full or in {{number}} instalments

paymentInfo.legal: During the payment, if allowed by the payee, the amount may be updated automatically and be subject to decreases (in case of discounts or credit notes) or increases (in case of penalties, interest, etc.).
